import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Logo from "../assets/img/logo-light.svg"; import Image from "../assets/img/login.png"; const Login = ({ history, loginUser = (f) => f }) => { let _email, _password; const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); loginUser(_email.value, _password.value); }; return (
